FuncDef: If the directory is empty, therdcommand is used to remove it. Theforceoption executes the command without prompting the user to confirm the action.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the directory to be removed. Values-local-url | remote-url|, local-url|[cflash-id/][file-path] 200 chars max, including cflash-id, |directory length 99 chars max each, remote-url |[ftp://login:pswd@remote-locn/][file-path], |247 chars max, |directory length 99 chars max each, remote-locn |[hostname | ipv4-address | "["ipv6-address"]"], ipv4-address |a.b.c.d, ipv6-address |x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x[-interface], |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d[-interface], |x - [0 to FFFF]H, |d - [0 to 255]D, |interface - 32 chars max, for link local addresses, cflash-id |cf1:, cf1-A:, cf1-B:, cf2:, cf2-A:, cf2-B:, cf3:, cf3-A:, cf3-B:.
Forces an immediate deletion of the specified directory. The rd file-url force command executes the command without displaying a user prompt message.
